name: The Servants' Quarters
description:
You are standing in a large room, that seems to house many of the
servants.  The room is full of comfortable-looking beds.  There is also
a large chest, probably containing some of the servants' belongings.

exits.description: The door is made out of wood.
exits.keywords: door wood~ 1 -1 15021 E bed~ The beds all look comfortable, despite the fact that this is just the servants' place.
door~ 1 15009 15022 E bed~ Looks very comfortable indeed.

exits.description: The door is large and heavy.
exits.keywords: door large heavy~ 1 -1 15023 E bunk bunks~ They look a bit hard, but you could sleep in them.

exits.description: The stairs down lead into darkness.

extra_descriptions.description:
They seem to be made of granite, and stretch down into a more dimly
lit area than where you come from.
